name: THE GREAT ADVENTURE (ELDRIASMITH)
description: My game is called  The Great Adventure. There are five levels in my game. It's basically like an escape room but there are giant orcs that you would have to battle in my game. The orcs are there to make it more difficult so then the characters won’t be able to pass. My characters are Harold, Carly, ,Marsha, and Lucius. Harold is a hero, Carly is a warrior, Marsha is a mage, and Lucius is a priest.
